title: A California Startup Just Flew Its $190,000 All-Electric Flying Car for the First Time

title: Why One Florida Dealer Is Suing Porsche For $300 Million

title: OTA Updates and Resale Value: How You Keep the Money
description: OTA updates sound impressive until you try to sell your car. Resale value comes down to cold auction math. descriptionSummary: The allure of OTA updates wears off when it's time to sell. Resale value hinges on cold, hard numbers at auction, where dealers follow a strict pricing guide and buyers prioritize practical features over upgrades that don't transfer with ownership.
